artefact.overview: You must be registered with your council if you operate a guard dog kennel in Northern Ireland
artefact.licence_short_description: Register with your council to operate a guard dog kennel in Northern Ireland.
artefact.licence_overview:
If you operate a guard dog kennels you must be registered with your council.

You will be provided with a certificate of registration if your application is accepted.
